title: Xbox One Will Play Next-Gen Games Via xCloud - Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.16.21
description:
Blessing and Andy talk about xCloud bringing next-gen games to Xbox One, PlayStation VR coming 2022, and more.

Time Stamps -
00:00:00 - Start
00:02:15 - Housekeeping
There is a surprise 50 minute video breakdown of that Zelda: Breath of the Wild 2 trailer up on our channel right now. Tim and Barrett scroll through the new trailer frame by frame and give their big theories and analysis on what exactly is going on.
Our Loki episode 2 reactions are also going up today!
You can find both of those on Youtube.com/KindaFunny and Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Donavan Harkness & Black Jack
The Roper Report  -
00:06:03 - Microsoft is bringing next-gen Xbox games to the Xbox One with xCloud - Tom Warren @ The Verge
00:19:04 - PlayStation VR 2 is reportedly being planned for holiday 2022 - Chris Scullion @ VGC
00:29:50 - Ad
00:31:15 - E3 had their E3 Awards last night! Let’s take a look at the winners - Kat Bailey @ IGN
00:42:00 - Grand Theft Auto Online for Xbox 360 and PS3 shutting down - Austen Goslin @ Polygon
00:44:45 - Look out for a behind the scenes look at Hellblade 2 at tomorrow’s Xbox event - Twitter
00:46:59 - Out today
00:53:15 - Squad Up:luciddre4m(PS5) - luciddre4m-
00:55:05 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Tim

Blessing and Andy talk about xCloud bringing next-gen games to Xbox One, PlayStation VR coming 2022, and more.


Time Stamps -

00:00:00 - Start

00:02:15 - Housekeeping

There is a surprise 50 minute video breakdown of that Zelda: Breath of the Wild 2 trailer up on our channel right now. Tim and Barrett scroll through the new trailer frame by frame and give their big theories and analysis on what exactly is going on.

Our Loki episode 2 reactions are also going up today!

You can find both of those on Youtube.com/KindaFunny and Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames.

Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Donavan Harkness & Black Jack
